title: nf-core/hlatyping pipeline parameters
description: Parameter set up for the nf-core/hlatyping analysis pipeline.

bam.description: BAM file format flag - hlatyping will extract the reads and remap.

single_end.description: Sequencing strategy - Flag if input data is of type single end.

seqtype.description: Sequence type - Tells hlatyping if input is of type DNA or RNA.

reads.description: Mapped or unmapped reads - HLA typing workflow input data.

index.description: Reference index URI - Yara HLA dna reference index location.

solver.description: IP solver alghorithm - Selects an IP solver alghorithm for hlatyping.

enumerations.description: Number of OptiType enumerations - Shows additional n-1 suboptimal solutions from OptiType.

beta.description: Weight for homozygosity accounting - Shows additional n-1 suboptimal solutions from OptiType-

prefix.description: Output file prefix - Adds a string prefix to the output files.
